content: So, seeing how the midterms are over, I thought wtf? Â I'll start a new thread for who do you think the nominees will be for the 2024 potus election?I know its early but I think it will be interesting to see how this plays out.All bets amongst members are welcome, though I won't be participating, just watching.I don't have a prediction because reasons, though I'm almost certain an idiot, not to be mentioned, who is probably gonna be indicted, will not be the republican nominee.But hey, I could be wrong, he was after all elected president, without even the popular vote, so there is that.
